text: wma tfrraq almushrikun biallah fi adyanhm fsaru shyeana wahzabana 'iilaa min baed ma ja'ahum aleilm waqamat alhujat elyhm, wama hmlhm ealaa dhlk 'iilaa albaghy walenad, walawla kalimat sabaqat min rabik -ayha alrswl- btakhyr aleadhab eanhum 'iilaa 'ajal musamana wahu yawm alqyamt, laqudi baynahum btejyl eadhab alkafirin mnhm. wa'iina aladhin 'uwrithuu altawrat wal'iinjil min baed hwla' almkhtlfyn fi alhaqu lafi shakin min aldiyn wal'iiman mwqe fi alrybt walakhtlaf almdhmwm
